description: Global Pay is a global blockchain financial technology company, focusing on blockchain financial technology, research and development and application in the fields of digital payment, asset management and risk control. Global-Pay Coin (hereinafter referred to as GPC) is the core certificate of circulation in the global payment system, and is also the carrier of technical consensus and value. It is characterized by openness, transparency, safety and efficiency. Since its establishment in 2018, Global Payments has been adhering to the concept of better serving users with digital assets, optimizing the traditional industry process cycle through financial technology, and enhancing work efficiency to empower enterprises. In the future, more partners will be invited to join in to create a digital payment ecosystem and achieve a win-win situation.
name: Global-Pay Coin
